{{knowledge objective |Identifiant=OIC-229-02-A |Item_parent=Venous access monitoring and complications |Item_parent_short=Venous access monitoring and complications |Rank=A |Title=Knowing the complications of different venous accesses |Description=Know the complications of peripheral and central venous accesses (infectious, thrombotic, mechanical, haemorrhagic, embolic (including gaseous)). |Rubric=Definition |Contributors= Philippe Lacroix, Simon Rickenbach |Order=2}} ("''[[Suspicion of an Adverse Drug Reaction or Care SD-348|suspicion of an Adverse Drug Reaction or Care]]'''", "''[[Acute Respiratory Distress SD-160|acute respiratory distress]]'''")

question.question: What is the most common complication of central venous access?
